Event.name: Intentionally_affect
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> causes a <fen>Patient</fen> to be affected, sometimes by a particular <fen>Means</fen> or by use of an <fen>Instrument</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Agent">A professional dishwasher</fex> doesn't <t>do</t> <fex name="Pat">dishes</fex> <fex name="Ins">with a rag</fex> <fex name="Time">anymore</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An intentional action performed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that accomplishes the action indicated by the target. </def-root>

Arg.name: Event
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the act that the <fen>Agent</fen> performs intentionally.</def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional act that affects the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>An entity directed by the <fen>Agent</fen> that interacts with an <fen>Patient</fen> to accomplish the action indicated by the target. </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the place where the <fen>Agent</fen> performs the intentional act. </def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the purpose for which an <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally affects a <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the time when the <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally affects the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Patient
Arg.definition: <def-root>Patient is the entity acted on and that may, but need not, undergo a change. <ex>A professional dishwasher <t>does</t> <fex name="Patient">dishes</fex> one at a time.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the event which is not covered by more specific FEs, including epistemic modification (probably, presumably, mysteriously), force (hard, softly), secondary effects (quietly, loudly), and general descriptions comparing events (the same way). It may also indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully). </def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>A state of affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> is responding to in performing the action. </def-root>

Arg.name: Degree
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Patient</fen> is affected by the <fen>Event</fen>.
</def-root>

lexUnit.name: do.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: work on (something) to bring it to completion or to a required state

lexUnit.name: do something (to/with).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: affect (an entity) by some unspecified action.

lexUnit.name: do what (to/with).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: affect (some entity) via an action that is in question.
